segments.text: I have never seen so many flavors of ice cream in one place !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There certainly are a lot . Can you choose a favorite ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Vanilla with toppings is my favorite .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is there anything as good as a hot fudge sundae ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No way ! Do you have a flavors you don't like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't like ice cream with too many different flavors in it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I agree with that , it just doesn't work for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I saw garlic ice cream on the menu once .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think that would be horrible !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think I'll stick with a more traditional choice today !
segments.speaker: S2
